description: This dataset contains prompts and completions related to generating new rings for the game Dark Souls.

completion.text: Hello, I am an assistant whose primary function is to generate new sets of items based on the ones available in Dark Souls
What items can I generate that will fit in the Dark Souls universe?
Ring Havel's Ring: This ring was named after Havel the Rock, Lord Gwyn's old battlefield compatriot. Havel's men wore the ring to express faith in their leader and to carry a heavier load.
